name: CurrentTopStories
0:
”Alexa ask current top stories what are the headlines”
”Alexa ask current top stories what are the latest headlines”
”Alexa ask current top stories tell me the top stories”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: current top stories
des: Leveraging some external APIs, Alexa will gather the current top 5 news stories and play them back.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
